3.10.0.0.message: Fixed an issue where Kong Gateway was not able to reconfigure the plugin when using DB-less mode.

3.9.1.0.message: Fixed an issue where the plugin was not able to reconfigure the plugin when using DB-less mode.

3.9.0.0.message:
Made the
`embeddings.model.name` config field a free text entry, enabling use of a
self-hosted (or otherwise compatible) model.
Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.
Fixed an issue where requests with multiple models caused failures.

3.8.1.0.message: Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.

3.8.0.0.message: Added the `ai-semantic-prompt-guard` plugin that supports semantic similarity-based prompt guarding.
